# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(dpdk-lib-librte_power)
target_compile_options(dpdk-lib-librte_power PRIVATE
  -DALLOW_EXPERIMENTAL_API
  -DALLOW_INTERNAL_API
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(dpdk-lib-librte_power PUBLIC
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/config
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_power
)
target_include_directories(dpdk-lib-librte_power PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_eal
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_eal/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_eal/linux/include
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_timer
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_eal/x86/include
)
target_link_libraries(dpdk-lib-librte_power PUBLIC
  dpdk-lib-librte_eal
  dpdk-lib-librte_kvargs
  dpdk-lib-librte_telemetry
  dpdk-lib-librte_timer
)
target_sources(dpdk-lib-librte_power PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_power/guest_channel.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_power/power_acpi_cpufreq.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_power/power_common.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_power/power_kvm_vm.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_power/power_pstate_cpufreq.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_power/rte_power.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/dpdk/lib/librte_power/rte_power_empty_poll.c
)
